page.title: 03EDUCATION
page.content: In our area there are two primary schools one secondary school and one tertiary college.Secondary education is based on the comprehensive system and the one school has approximately 1200 children ( this is our school ). The primary schools form just part of the feeder schools to our large comprehensive, the other three are outside the area and many of the children have to be bused to school. The tertiary college is to open in 1986 and will be housed in what is now the technical college. It is intended to cater for as wide a spectrum of needs as is possible for all its 16+ pupils, whether they be in the technical or tertiary sections. Besides these educational facilities there are also two play school goups.
